Job Posting: 177582 - Position: S26 Junior Solutions Consultant Co-op 177582 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/30/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/22/2026 11:59 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Trulioo Information Services Inc. 114 E 4th Ave #400 Vancouver V5T 1G2 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description 2026 - Summer S26 Junior Solutions Consultant Co-op 177582 Co-op Position Vancouver, BC Canada 8 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 40 Major List $22-$25 per hour Work-Term Arrangements • Upcoming Work Term: Monday May 5th - Friday December 18th, 2026 • Schedule: Full-Time (40 hours per week). • Hybrid Model: Minimum of 3 days per week on-site at our Mount Pleasant office. • Compensation: $22/hour for Bachelor's students | $25/hour for Master's students | plus 4% vacation pay. • Perks: Catered lunches, snacks, and refreshments. • Team Culture: Monthly happy hours, office events, co-op socials, and branded Trulioo swag. Are you ready to embark on a career that truly affects people around the world? Trulioo invites you to be a catalyst for change in the dynamic realm of digital identity verification. As the global front-runner in our industry, we are redefining how businesses grow, innovate and comply online. Picture yourself at the forefront of innovation, contributing to our award-winning platform that enables organizations worldwide to quickly onboard customers, optimize costs and combat fraud. Fueled by Silicon Valley support, Trulioo stands as the trusted platform that can verify more than 5 billion people and 700 million business entities spanning 195 countries. But Trulioo is more than a tech company. We are a united force of dedicated experts committed to establishing trust online. Headquartered in Vancouver and with strategic hubs in San Diego and Dublin, we foster a culture of collaboration and open communication. Our offices support a hybrid model and staff typically work three days per week at a hub location. Join us where excitement meets innovation and contribute to a world where trust and technology unite.. Position Summary Reporting to the Team Lead, Solutions Consulting, we are looking for a Junior Solutions Consultant Co-op to join our Solutions Consultant team. This will be a full-time position working out of the Vancouver office on a hybrid model (3-days per week in the office). What You'll Be Doing: • Learn about Trulioo's core product offerings and how they help solve customers' technical and business requirements • Work collaboratively with the Solutions Consulting team and Account Executives to support solutions design, evaluation, and implementation during the sales cycle • Lead special projects such as creating a knowledge base for RFI/RFP and commercial proposals, building training materials, and new tools that enhance the team's ability to demonstrate value • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful delivery of solutions internally and externally • Continuously learn and stay current on industry trends and new technologies to ensure Trulioo maintains our position as the leading trusted expert in Identity Verification Thriving at Trulioo At Trulioo, you're not just an employee. You're a valued member of our Trulicrew on a journey of professional and personal growth with a world-class organization. With Trulioo, you have the power to revolutionize the intersection of technology, digital trust and online identity to open the global economy to everyone. Together, we can shape the digital future. We're on the lookout for exceptional people to empower with trust, autonomy and the freedom to cultivate their potential. Your curiosity, meticulous attention to detail and passion to contribute are highly valued. If that resonates with you, apply today to become a part of our team. Join us in shaping a future where your career isn't just a journey but also a boundless exploration into the possibilities of technology and digital identity verification. Get an inside look at life at Trulioo by following us on LinkedIn, or learn more about us at www.trulioo.com If you don't see yourself fully reflected in every job requirement listed on the posting above, we still encourage you to reach out and apply. Research has shown that minorities and underrepresented groups often only apply when they feel 100% qualified. We are committed to creating a more equitable, inclusive and diverse company and we strongly encourage applicants of all genders, ages, ethnicities, cultures, abilities, sexual orientations, and life experiences to apply. Trulioo welcomes applications from people with disabilities. Support is available upon request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process. Finally, we know from time-to-time emergencies happen and you may need to reschedule an interview - we understand and encourage you to be in communication without worrying about losing the opportunity or your credibility. Privacy Notice As part of our job application process, Trulioo collects, processes, and discloses personal data for the purpose of identifying suitable candidates for our job openings. For more detail, please visit Trulioo's Website Privacy Policy in the section "When you apply for a job". Job Requirements Important Requirements • You must be pursuing a diploma/degree at an accredited post-secondary institution and participating in your university's co-op program. • Complete all necessary requirements set forth by your educational institution, including application processes and associated fees. • For international students, possession of a valid Co-op work permit from Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is mandatory. • Candidates must be available for the full duration of the work-term and work out of our Vancouver office on a hybrid model. Please note that fully remote or shortened work-terms are not available What You'll Bring: • A desire to be the bridge between technical and non-technical teams. You thrive in helping others understand complex topics • Pursuing a Bachelor's in Computer Science, Data Science, or Business • Exceptional verbal, written communication, and teamwork skills to articulate technical product specifications and product value propositions • Strong analytical skills, problem-solving ability, and attention to detail • Experience creating and sharing compelling narratives using data storytelling • Technical background with familiarity in any combination of the following: JSON, RESTful API's, SQL, and relational databases • Approach problems as an opportunity to learn and bring in new ideas Citizenship Requirement N/A Position Start Date Position End Date May 04, 2026 12:00 AM December 18, 2026 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions APPLICATION LINK: https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/trulioo-coopandinterns/041ff375-9693-4312-94d9-e07ef7f4813b Application Deadline: 11:59 pm on Friday, February 6th. • Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
